channel.title: Comments on: I’m Replaying Far Cry 4 – Looking forward to FC6

item.title: By: Goatchis22
item.dc:creator: Goatchis22
item.description: Love that you’re replaying 4 instead of 5 cause same hahaha
item.content:encoded: Love that you’re replaying 4 instead of 5 cause same hahaha

item.title: By: BelgianBond
item.dc:creator: BelgianBond
item.description: Skipping this one helped me summon up newfound enthusiasm for Far Cry when the fifth one released, but maybe I missed out on this Himalayan escapade.
item.content:encoded: Skipping this one helped me summon up newfound enthusiasm for Far Cry when the fifth one released, but maybe I missed out on this Himalayan escapade.

item.title: By: Sure_Consideration25
item.dc:creator: Sure_Consideration25
item.description: I’m actually really disappointed with the directions farcry has taken. It’s just so modern gaming where nothing is good or bad it’s just meh. I knew when I saw that stupid fucking rocket artillery backpack and a wiener dog with no back legs in the middle of a gun fight I wasn’t going to buy the game.
item.content:encoded: I’m actually really disappointed with the directions farcry has taken. It’s just so modern gaming where nothing is good or bad it’s just meh. I knew when I saw that stupid fucking rocket artillery backpack and a wiener dog with no back legs in the middle of a gun fight I wasn’t going to buy the game.

item.title: By: Indigenous_Indominus
item.dc:creator: Indigenous_Indominus
item.description: The best Ubisoft franchise in my opinion.
item.content:encoded: The best Ubisoft franchise in my opinion.

item.title: By: Oniricho
item.dc:creator: Oniricho
item.description: I love FC series and hate them at the same time. They're repetitive classic UBI games, same shit in every next games, but i have all of them, and waiting for FC6 too :/
item.content:encoded: I love FC series and hate them at the same time. They’re repetitive classic UBI games, same shit in every next games, but i have all of them, and waiting for FC6 too :/

item.title: By: VysceraTheHunter
item.dc:creator: VysceraTheHunter
item.description: Far cry is a shit game and buying it supports a company of abusers. Boycott ubisoft.
item.content:encoded: Far cry is a shit game and buying it supports a company of abusers. Boycott ubisoft.
